intro: Aethionema dumelicum, commonly known as the rock cress, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is a low-growing perennial that typically thrives in rocky or sandy soils. The plant produces small, bright yellow flowers that bloom in early spring. Its leaves are pinnately divided, giving it a distinctive appearance. Aethionema dumelicum is often found in coastal areas and is adapted to withstand harsh environmental conditions.
